review: This has a hard time keeping connected to the home wifi. Still havent decided if I should return it or not
author: dman

review: This does exactly what I bought it for. I downloaded an App for my Galaxy 5 called "TVFI" and can mirror my phone to the TV. Such a convenient product!
author: David Barrero

review: Awesome and super easy to use!  Ordering a second one for the other TV in the house.  Easy set up and easy installation!
author: Kindle Customer

review: I love watching black and white movies that item has provided just that.
author: Virginia E. Moreno

review: Easy to set up and use. Good product.
author: Brittany Grogan

review: Incredibly easy to set up and works well.  Movies load instantly despite my very slow internet speed.  The only reason I bought it was to have easy access to Amazon Prime videos.  I wish it the device had more additional features that I'm interested in (I have Apple TV already and they essentially offer the same except for each machine's proprietary channels - iTunes vs Amazon) but for the very low price it's worth adding Amazon Fire TV Stick.  Now to buy an HDMI switcher for all my devices and HDMI cables.
author: C. Taylor "Movie Maven"

review: Plugged it in and working great.
author: Robert

review: Great little gadget.  Easy to install and get started with!
author: k. cor
